name: Battlefield 3
description:
Experimental installer.
Aiming to provide an environment compatible with ReShade and DXVK.
notes:
Experimental installer.
DXVK is supported but not used by default. It can be enabled from the settings.
ReShade seems to be injecting but it exits immediately as there is an error i have not yet found out.
The following Origin features must be disabled prior to running the game:
	- Origin WebHelper
	- Origin InGame
	- Origin Overlay for BF3
content:
files:
- directxweb: https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/7/1/1718CCC4-6315-4D8E-9543-8E28A4E18C4C/dxwebsetup.exe
- vc2008x64: https://download.microsoft.com/download/d/2/4/d242c3fb-da5a-4542-ad66-f9661d0a8d19/vcredist_x64.exe
- updater: https://lutris.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/origin/updateorigin.sh
- origin: https://download.dm.origin.com/origin/live/OriginThinSetup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_file:
    content: dxgi.nvapiHack = False
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/nv-shaders"
- chmodx: updater
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin
    src: updater
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing DirectX...
    executable: directxweb
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing VC...
    executable: vc2008x64
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin...
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: origin
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_HUD: fps
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/nv-shaders
  exclude_processes: QtWebEngineProcess.exe ActivationUI.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
  manual_command: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/updateorigin.sh
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1366x768
  esync: true
  overrides:
    dxgi: native, builtin
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
